column1: Smoque BBQ////I am officially obsessed with this place. It's crowded on weekends
column2: but not on weekdays! Weekday afternoons are definitely the best time to go if you want no lines and no waiting. I also must say that the lines during the busy times look long
column3: but the wait time is never really that bad (and the food is DEFINITELY worth the wait!). Helpful hosts/bussers clear you a table while you wait in line to order
column4: and once you've placed your order you'll have a place to sit (usually
column5: depending on how busy it is).
